div.span: Takes an input bitmap (.bmp) image and outputs a bitmap image
Supports serial and parallel execution of the algorithm.
Serial version runs on the host CPU, while the parallel version

div.div: supports execution on an NVIDIA GPU by using the CUDA C++ framework.";

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 734px; margin-left: 878px;

line-height: 23px;
line-height: 23px;
line-height: 23px;

div.span: /*{0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0} is the last element in the array of type struct argp_option,
used to indicate the end of the array. In this array, each element represents a
command-line option, including the name, abbreviation, parameter, description,
and other information. Adding {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0} after the last element is to
tell the parser that the array has ended and there are no other options left.*/

div.div: 定义结构体保持解析后的参数

switch.text: 定义结构体保持解析后的参数

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 684px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2113px; margin-left: 87px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

line-height: 23px;
div.div: static error_t parse_opt (int key, char *arg, struct argp_state *state)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 308px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2113px; margin-left: 878px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 定义回调函数，每次解析一个选项时，都会调用这函数，其中key 短横线选项的字符的ASCII 码值,比如：`-i` 那么就是`i` 的ASCII 码值， 而arg 是该选项的字符串,例如：`-i img/xx_in.jpg` ，那么 arg 就是：`img/xx_in.jpg`

switch.text: 定义回调函数，每次解析一个选项时，都会调用这函数，其中key 短横线选项的字符的ASCII 码值,比如：`-i` 那么就是`i` 的ASCII 码值， 而arg 是该选项的字符串,例如：`-i img/xx_in.jpg`...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2312px; margin-left: 1315px;

span.style: background-color: initial; font-family: Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 17px; text-align: left;
background-color: initial; border-color: var(--border-color); font-family: Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 17px; text-align: left;
background-color: initial; font-family: Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 17px; text-align: left;

font.face: Consolas, Courier New, monospace

div.style: text-align: left;

font.face: Consolas, Courier New, monospace
font.span: 代表存储解析结果的状态

div.style: text-align: left;
div.span: 表示当前的解析状态，是一个指向

code.style: background-color: initial; padding: 0px; font-family: Consolas, monaco, monospace;

span.style: background-color: initial; font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;

div.span: 结构体的指针。这个结构体包含了一些关于当前解析状态的信息，例如当前已经解析的选项和参数的个数等。

switch.text: struct argp_state *state代表存储解析结果的状态...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 348px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2310px; margin-left: 1408px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

text-align: left;
div.div: $5 = {root_argp = 0x7fffffffd8f0, argc = 6, argv = 0x7fffffffdd08, next = 0, flags = 0, arg_num = 0, quoted = 0, input = 0x7fffffffdbc0, child_inputs = 0x0,

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 448px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2516px; margin-left: 808px;

div.div: // state->input 转换为 arguments 类型的指针，

div.style: color: rgb(212, 212, 212); background-color: rgb(30, 30, 30); font-family: Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; line-height: 23px;

switch.text: // state->input 转换为 arguments 类型的指针，...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2519px; margin-left: 1852px;

div.div: 这说明state->input原本指向的也这种类型，

div.style: color: rgb(212, 212, 212); background-color: rgb(30, 30, 30); font-family: Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; line-height: 23px;

span.style: background-color: initial; border-color: var(--border-color); color: rgb(156, 220, 254);

div.span: 后面会看到，这个类似在main函数arp_parse中传递进来的,

div.style: background-color: rgb(30, 30, 30); font-family: Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; line-height: 23px;
div.font: 而且state->input 是一个void 类型的指针，所以这里使用时

div.style: background-color: rgb(30, 30, 30); font-family: Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; line-height: 23px;
div.font: 需要进行强制转换，这样的好处是可以在mian函数那边传递任意

div.style: background-color: rgb(30, 30, 30); font-family: Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; line-height: 23px;
div.font: 类型的数据结构，然后在当前函数中访问该类型的成员。

switch.text: 这说明state->input原本指向的也这种类型，...

code.style: background-color: transparent; padding: 0px; font-family: Consolas, monaco, monospace; word-break: break-all;

pre.code:
error_t argp_parse (const struct argp *argp, int argc, char **argv,
unsigned flags, int *arg_index, void *input);

switch.text: error_t argp_parse (const struct argp *argp, int argc, char **argv,...

div.div: static struct argp argp = {options, parse_opt, NULL, doc, 0, 0, 0};

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 448px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2875px; margin-left: 828px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

color: rgb(212, 212, 212); background-color: rgb(30, 30, 30); font-family: Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; line-height: 23px;

div.div: options 是之前定义的结构体数组

div.style: color: rgb(212, 212, 212); background-color: rgb(30, 30, 30); font-family: Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; line-height: 23px;

div.div: parse_opt 是之前定义的回调函数

div.style: color: rgb(212, 212, 212); background-color: rgb(30, 30, 30); font-family: Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; line-height: 23px;

div.div: doc 是之前定义的字符串数组

switch.text: 构造一个结构体argp 类型是库中的...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 681px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2875px; margin-left: 1361px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
text-align: left;
background-color: rgb(30, 30, 30); line-height: 23px;

p.style: color: rgb(241, 242, 242); font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-color: rgb(38, 38, 38);

div.p: 这个 argp 结构体是 GNU C 库中的一个结构体，用于定义命令行选项和参数的规则，以及解析命令行参数的方式。

p.style: color: rgb(241, 242, 242); font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; background-color: rgb(38, 38, 38);

div.p: argp 结构体的定义如下：

font.face: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif
-apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif
-apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif
-apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

span.font: const struct argp_option *options; /* 定义命令行选项和参数的规则 */

font.face: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif
font.span: argp_parser_t parser; /* 解析命令行选项和参数的回调函数 */

font.face: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif
font.span: const char *args_doc; /* 命令行参数的文本描述 */

font.face: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif
font.span: const char *doc; /* 命令行工具的文本描述 */

font.face: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif
-apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif
-apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif
font.span: void *input; /* 指向自定义数据的指针 */

font.face: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif
-apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif
font.span: int argc; /* 命令行参数个数 */

font.face: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif
font.span: char **argv; /* 命令行参数的字符串数组 */

font.face: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif

switch.text: 这个 argp 结构体是 GNU C 库中的一个结构体，用于定义命令行选项和参数的规则，以及解析命令行参数的方式。...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 678px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2875px; margin-left: 2128px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

div.p: 这个结构体将在main 函数中被调用，例如，下面代码最后一行中的`&argp`：

div.style: font-family: Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 17px; line-height: 23px;
line-height: 23px;

div.span: /* storage and defaults for command line arguments */

switch.text: 这个结构体将在main 函数中被调用，例如，下面代码最后一行中的`&argp`：...

div.span:
调用 库函数 argp_parse,传入参数，在头文件中定义的结构体：&argp，还有 &args,用于保存解析的结果。
argp_parse(

pre.font: 所以在头文件中会出现 类型转换的操作

switch.text: &args 是赋值给 void* input ,这是void类型指针...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 518px; height: 1px; padding-top: 197px; margin-left: 2172px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.div: Canny edge detector written in C++.
Takes an input bitmap (.bmp) image and outputs a bitmap image
Supports serial and parallel execution of the algorithm.
Serial version runs on the host CPU, while the parallel version
supports execution on an NVIDIA GPU by using the CUDA C++ framework.
-s, --serial Execute serially on host CPU (GPU otherwise).
Mandatory or optional arguments to long options are also mandatory or optional
